data.title: Christian Learning Center
data.meta_description: HIS Pods Christian Learning Class Center provides high equality, affordable education in Jaco, Costa Rica taught at Horizon Church.
data.text:
Discover the first Christian private education option in Jaco, Costa Rica. Located in Horizon Church, Horizon International School (HIS) is committed to providing academic excellence through a Christ-centered curriculum. Our dedicated Christian teachers create a nurturing environment where students from grades K-12 can thrive. Join us on this exciting journey as we bring light into Jaco!

Our students acquire real world, cross cultural experience as part of their education. From adventurous field trips community service projects, our kids have unique opportunities to share the gospel. Our school learning strategy is both challenging and adaptable to meet your student's needs.

Our educational foundation built on Christian school curriculum, traditional classroom instruction, and blended online learning environments in the upper grades equips our students for life outside the classroom. A large emphasis is placed on our students developing adequate communication skills in both English and Spanish. For native Spanish speaking students, the chance to learn English opens up doors for them in career advancement. For native English speaking students, the chance to learn Spanish allows them to be integrated better with their local community. With a brand new virtual learning room, high school students have the opportunity to take college dual credit courses to get a head start on their higher education.

Our Christian school is structured in small class room format. Open enrollment takes place twice a year in August and December. Spots are very limited and are on a first come, first serve basis.
